function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The spread of COVID-19 due to physical interaction and lack of lockdown measures","Impact":"High infection rates, strain on healthcare systems, and increased mortality","Mitigation":"Implement strict lockdown measures, limit physical interaction, and enforce public health guidelines","Technologies":"Contact tracing, remote learning technologies, and telemedicine","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Governments, public health authorities, and education institutions"},{"Description":"Impact of occupant presence and actions on building energy use","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and environmental impact","Mitigation":"Educational programs on energy conservation, smart building technologies, and energy-efficient infrastructure","Technologies":"Smart meters, occupancy sensors, and energy management systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and sustainability consultants","Owner":"Building owners, facility management companies, and sustainability experts"}]}
